message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for you and am happy to answer any questions you might have. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,500. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. Could we meet in the middle at $14,000?  This price reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $14,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm offering $13,500. Can you consider this price?
